column2: an A.M. Eatery////Quite possibly the BEST tomato soup I have ever eaten!  Not kidding.  It's weird
column3: I know.  Who raves about tomato soup?  But have you ever ordered a grilled cheese sandwich with tomato soup with the anticipation that the soup would steal the show?!?  I don't think you have
column4: and it was honestly THAT good.  It was light
column5: not too heavy with cream yet smooth
column6: and perfectly acidic and balanced.  The grilled cheese was tasty too
column7: but that SOUP!  I've also had the breakfast pot pie and it was excellent.  The service is perfect...if you go early during the week
column8: treat yourself and sit at the bar with the lovely ThereOnly deducting one star for parking...it's pretty bad even when it isn't busy.
